text: Sa'asrifu `An 'Ayatiya Al-Ladhina Yatakabbaruna Fi Al-'ArÄ‘i Bighayri Al-Haqqi Wa 'In Yaraw Kulla 'Ayatin La Yu'uminu Biha Wa 'In Yaraw Sabila Ar-Rushdi La Yattakhidhuhu Sabilaan Wa 'In Yaraw Sabila Al-Ghayyi Yattakhidhuhu Sabilaan Dhalika Bi'annahum Kadhabu Bi'ayatina Wa Kanu `Anha Ghafilina
